name: Over The Moon (bobcgames, soulsoftea, Robin Harper, Deevil)
name_original: Over The Moon (bobcgames, soulsoftea, Robin Harper, Deevil)
description:
Puzzle your way out of trouble when you're rescued by a mysterious alien from a failed mission to Neptune

Over The Moon is a puzzle-driven visual novel, developed in one month for NaNoRenO 2021. The game plays in around 30 minutes, and features:

  • 7000 words
  • Seven logic puzzles that build on each other
  • Seven other puzzles ranging from point-and-click to jigsaw puzzles

It was developed through the collaborative efforts of Bob Conway on coding (and puzzling), Deevilj on sprites and backgrounds, Illuminate001 on GUI, and Robin Harper on writing.

(Don't like puzzles? Find spoilers for all of the puzzles here and simply experience the story, instead!)

Note: You can download the game and play locally if you run into issues with the web version, or simply prefer to play locally
